metadata.title: CVE-2024-27322 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in the R statisticalprogramming language, on any version starting at 1.4.0 up to and notincluding 4.4.0, enabling a maliciously crafted RDS (R Data Serialization)formatted file or R package to run arbitrary code on an end userâ€™s systemwhen interacted with.

criterions.comment: r-base package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
